message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth more than $80 to me. I am willing to sell it to you for $120. I believe this is a fair price considering its quality and value.

I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value, and I'm willing to make a compromise. Can you meet me halfway?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your position and would like to propose an alternative. How about we agree on a price of $100 for the product? This still allows us to maintain a reasonable profit while being mindful of your budget.

I appreciate your revised offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value, and I'm willing to make another compromise. Can you meet me at this price?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. Considering the quality and value of the product, how about we settle on $98? This still allows us to maintain a good profit margin while being fair to your budget.

I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $95. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $95 and $98. How about we agree on $96.50? This is the best compromise I can make, considering my budget.
